examples: One mall reported a significant increase in revenue on Friday and Saturday nights after they began enforcing a curfew.

images.alt: Photo of a person putting money into an envelope.
images.description: A person putting paper money into an envelope.
images.caption: Revenue is another word for money earned or taken in.

examples: Their local mall recently instituted a 6:00 p.m. curfew for anyone under 16 years old, so the teenagers needed to leave the building at 6 pm.
After instituting the curfew, the Mall of America reported a decrease from 300 to only two incidents involving bad behavior by teens.

meanings.definition: A person who accompanies another person, often for protection.
examples: Around 50 of 1,200 U.S. malls have policies requiring that teens have adult escorts, to reduce the amount of teenage mischief.

images.alt: Photo of a parade led by police motorcycles
images.description: Police motorcycles on a road, riding in front of other motorcycle riders.
images.caption: The police motorcycles are escorting, or going with, the other riders in the parade.

meanings.definition: To call on something, such as a law or principle, for support.
examples: Because of the success of curfews and adult escorts, more malls are likely to invoke adult responsibility to monitor teen behavior.

meanings.definition: Related to or permitted by the law.
examples: All people in the U.S. have a right to a legal trial if they are accused of a crime.

images.description: A wooden gavel, used in a court of law, is shown on a table.
images.caption: In courts of law, judges use a gavel when they end a case.

meanings.definition: Related to or permitted by the law.
examples: All people in the U.S. have a right to a judicial trial if they are accused of a crime.

images.description: A wooden gavel, used in a court of law, is shown on a table.
images.caption: In courts of law, judges use a gavel when they end a case.

examples: According to scientists, last year was the warmed year ever recorded on Earth.
According to scientists, last year was the warmed year ever recorded on Earth.
Some people have vague symptoms, which makes it hard for doctors to find out the cause of their illness.

images.alt: Photo of a blurry, dimly lit person.
images.description: The person is pictured in low light, and the focus is blurred. Together, these make the figure, and the person's surroundings, unclear and hard to see.
images.caption: The person and the surroundings are blurred and so are hard to see.

examples: Some people have ambiguous symptoms, which makes it hard for doctors to find out the cause of their illness.

images.alt: Photo of a blurry, dimly lit person.
images.description: The person is pictured in low light, and the focus is blurred. Together, these make the figure, and the person's surroundings, unclear and hard to see.
images.caption: The person and the surroundings are blurred and so are hard to see.

meanings.definition: Someone who buys things for personal use.
examples: During holiday times, consumers spend a lot of money on gifts.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking at a refrigerator case of milk.
images.description: A person is in a store, and looks at a case filled with milk containers. The containers have prices below them, showing that the milk containers are for sale.
images.caption: A person looks at the different options available for buying milk.

meanings.definition: Someone who buys things for personal use.
examples: During holiday times, purchasers spend a lot of money on gifts.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking at a refrigerator case of milk.
images.description: A person is in a store, and looks at a case filled with milk containers. The containers have prices below them, showing that the milk containers are for sale.
images.caption: A person looks at the different options available for buying milk.

meanings.definition: To try to prevent or persuade not to do.
examples: Their mother tried to discourage them from making poor decisions.

meanings.definition: To try to prevent or persuade not to do.
examples: Their mother tried to discourage them from making poor decisions.
